level.heading: Books and Other Library Materials Account Amendment Act of 2012.

level.text: There is established as a nonlapsing account the Books and Other Library Materials Account ("Account") into which shall be deposited:
All receipts from the sale of used books and other library materials;
Proceeds from the sale of library-related merchandise;
Gifts, grants, and donations designated for collections; and
Such amounts as may be appropriated for books and other library materials.

The Account shall be used solely for the purpose of procuring books and other library materials, including compact disks, electronic materials, or other records and materials, to maintain and enhance the collection of the District of Columbia Public Library.

All funds deposited into the Account, and any interest earned on those funds, shall not revert to the unrestricted fund balance of the General Fund of the District of Columbia at the end of a fiscal year, or at any other time, but shall be continually available for the uses and purposes set forth in subsection (b) of this section without regard to fiscal year limitation, subject to authorization by Congress.
